name: openbudgeteer
description: OpenBudgeteer is a self-hosted personal budgeting tool inspired by YNAB. It allows managing envelopes, categories, and expenses across months using a clean, responsive interface.
features: Envelope budgeting: Allocate income to spending categories using zero-based budgeting principles for better control.
Transaction import: Upload bank statements in CSV format for automatic categorization and reconciliation.
Monthly planning: Set budget amounts for each category and track spending progress throughout the month.
Category management: Create custom spending groups and subcategories to match your financial structure.
Responsive design: Access your budget from desktop or mobile browsers with an interface that adapts to screen size.
Multi-account support: Track checking, savings, and credit accounts separately while maintaining unified budget categories.
Reporting tools: View spending trends, category breakdowns, and historical comparisons to understand financial patterns.
Data ownership: Keep all financial information on your own server without sharing with third-party services.
